name: Dead Do Dance
description:
Don't need no feet to dance!

You're a ghost who wants to play a dancing videogame! Sadly, you have no feet. On the other hand, you do have a stick, so let's use that instead!

Use letter keys to move the stick around different positions and spacebar to hit the notes at the right time! It's a simple game idea, but gets pretty tricky as it gets harder.

Very much a work in progress right now, the current submission for the Jam is a proof-of-concept, core gameplay build. More updates to follow post-jam. This is a one-man project, all assets created by me. 

Please see the devlog for the postmortem!

Created for Butterscotch ShenaniJam, with theme '[Ep72] Step Ghost'.
